Reviews.Title: “poor decor, patchy service”
Reviews.Author: Simon S
Reviews.Content: booked hotel business stopover checked late straight relax unfortunately card operate light didnt properly spend twenty minutes dark reception staff torch makeshift solution bed uncomfortable morning shower head kept sliding downwards shower breakfast included breakfast couple tables occupied breakfast waitress space told shrug sit outside middecember decided pass breakfast £55 price hotel werent expecting premium experience decor service indifferent recommend hotel fellow travellers

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Place”
Reviews.Author: GmaFred90
Reviews.Content: spent week hotel adequate ensuite bathroom wonderful modern shower refrigerator plus coffee maker cups etc granddaughter spent week comfy hotel spoiled wont convenient sleep close tube stations paddington natl rail heathrow breakfast basement toasters lots bread butter jams marmalade hard boiled eggs cheese corn flakes milk plus coffee tea elevator hike stairs thats fun clean quiet

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: c-krogh
Reviews.Content: okay location thats couldnt actually sit toilet sink signs walls tried payment system credit card fine unfriendly attitude employees sheet double bed single sheets sown correlation price value price london
